ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Are you,
um...doing OK today?
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
I was waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. I kinda wanted
to talk to you about something.
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
If that sort of thing works for you, I can
get more...
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
There’s something I wanna give you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
You’re always helping me out, so...it’s just
my way of saying thanks.
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Here. I put a lot of effort into getting you
this present.
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
I did some research into what you might like,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
’Cause you’re a really important friend to
me, too...
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
Maybe talking with you will make me better
at it with others...
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Talking’s easier when I’m with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Is this...for me? Oh, um... Thanks.
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Is it really OK for me to have this?
I’ll treasure it forever!
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I have to return the favor... I promise I’ll find
a way to thank you!
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2402_01_10: See you later, then. It was fun chatting.
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
Time sure flies... Bet it’s ’cause you’re
who I was chatting with,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0293_00_button_salon/8201_2401_02_10: Let’s chat again sometime. Hasta la vistar! ★
ch0293_00_button_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
I don’t know everyone here, so it’s a little
rough for someone shy like me...
ch0293_00_button_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
But maybe this is my chance to make more
friends who share my hobbies.
ch0293_00_button_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
It’d be great if more folks became Veevee
fans!
ch0293_00_button_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Ever feel it’s easier to talk online than
in person?
ch0293_00_button_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
Since you can’t see each other’s face,
I guess it’s less intimidating...
ch0293_00_button_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
I may take a while to get better at talking
face-to-face, but...thanks for being patient
with me.
ch0293_00_button_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
I love machines, so I’m always tinkering with
them in my spare time.
ch0293_00_button_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
They’re like a part of me now. I can’t
imagine life without smartphones or
computers...
ch0293_00_button_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
There are quite a few people on Pasio who
feel the same. It makes me feel validated,
in a way.
